web_snippets: Antonio Villaraigosa ; Antonio Ramón Villar Jr. (1953-01-23) January 23, 1953 (age 72) Los Angeles, California, U.S. · Democratic.
Antonio Villaraigosa, American Democratic politician who served as the mayor of Los Angeles (2005–13), the first Hispanic to hold the post since 1872.
